dataList.name: Melee Combat
dataList.desc:
หากความเร็วของตัวละครนี้สูงกว่าเป้าหมาย, deal +10% damage ตามทุก ๆ Speed difference (สูงสุด 30%)
If this unit's Speed is slower than the target's deal -10% damage ตามทุก ๆ Speed difference (สูงสุด 30%)

dataList.name: Charge Forth
dataList.desc: Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1 ตามทุก ๆ 5 [Breath] on self (สูงสุด 4)

dataList.name: Summon Targets
dataList.desc:
At 75%- HP, ได้รับ a new pattern
When gaining a new pattern, summon G Corp. Head Manager and Downcast Veteran; then, สร้าง Stigmatized บนตัวเป้าหมาย with the least current HP
- Change Min & Max Speed values on self to 1.
- ได้รับ 300 Shield HP.

dataList.name: Designate Target
dataList.desc: When using Designated Target Fire or Target Readjustment Fire: among targets with the slowest Speed, สร้าง [FellBulletMark] against target with the least current HP

dataList.name: Oxygen Supply
dataList.desc:
At the first เริ่มเทิร์น of the turn Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day appeared, it gains 10 [Breath] Potency and +10 [Breath] Count

จบเทิร์น: at less than 10 [Breath] Potency or [Breath] Count, ผลาญ HP from the Head Part เท่ากับ 2% of the Core's max HP to ได้รับ 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count (cannot be Part broken or defeated due to this effect)

dataList.name: Deep Breath
dataList.desc:
Multiply Critical Chance from [Breath] effects by x 1.5

On Crit:
- At 15+ [Breath] Potency, ผลาญ up to ([Breath] Potency on self / 5) [Breath] Potency to deal +([Breath] Potency consumed x 4)% damage on Crit
- At 15+ [Breath] Count, ผลาญ up t ([Breath] Count on self / 5) [Breath] Count to deal +([Breath] Count consumed x 8)% damage on Crit

dataList.name: Oxygen-saturated
dataList.desc:
In the turn this unit uses 'That's... Mine!', fix its Speed to 1. เมื่อเริ่มเทิร์น, apply 6 [Breath] Potency and +6 [Breath] Count to all units present on the Stage.

At the end of the same turn, ผลาญ any excess [Breath] Potency and [Breath] Count past 5 Potency and 5 Count; then, at the ในเทิร์นถัดไป Start, apply the same amount of [Breath] Potency and [Breath] Count consumed to the Head Part

dataList.name: Shattered Ribcage
dataList.desc: When the Body Part is broken, remove the Body Part ในเทิร์นถัดไป and replace it with a Person Part

dataList.name: Ribcage Regeneration
dataList.desc:
At Combat End, halve the [Breath] Potency and [Breath] Count on the Person Part
ในเทิร์นถัดไป, the Person Part disappears and is replaced by Body Part

dataList.name: Excruciating Suffering
dataList.desc:
Every time this unit loses a Clash and takes a hit, lose 1 [Breath] Potency

Every time this unit is hit by an Unopposed Attack, lose 1 [Breath] Count

This unit's [Breath] Potency and [Breath] Count, regardless of whether an attack hit Critically or whether its Passive activated, does not drop below 5

dataList.name: Anguished Screaming
dataList.desc: At 40% or less Core HP, use 'Share the Pain' ในเทิร์นถัดไป

dataList.name: After Effect
dataList.desc: When the Person dies, both the Body and the Head Parts ได้รับ +0.2 Resistance to Slash, Pierce, and Blunt until ในเทิร์นถัดไป (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Indulgent Petals
dataList.desc:
จบเทิร์น: at 20+ [BloodDinner], ผลาญ up to 50 [BloodDinner] and heal the Core and the Head Parts เท่ากับ [BloodDinner] consumed
- Does not activate if the Head Part is either Staggered or Destroyed

dataList.name: A Drop of Nourishment
dataList.desc:
After Attack, heal the Core and the Part เท่ากับ the amount of damage this unit's Attack Skill dealt
- Does not activate if the Head Part is either Staggered or Destroyed

dataList.name: Yearning
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: if this unit healed HP, ได้รับ 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseDown] ในเทิร์นถัดไป ตามทุก ๆ 10 HP healed (สูงสุด 10)

dataList.name: Bloodthirsty Stench
dataList.desc:
At 100+ [BloodDinner], use a special Skill
จบเทิร์น: at 500+ [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit, or if this unit is at less than 60% HP, ได้รับ a new pattern

dataList.name: Refracted Sin
dataList.desc: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] Potency only stacks up to 50 (including the Unique variations of above Keywords)

dataList.name: Sharp Thorn
dataList.desc: If this unit's Body Part takes damage from an enemy Skill, สร้าง +1 [Laceration] Count on the attacker (once per turn per Identity)

dataList.name: Endless Thirst
dataList.desc:
เริ่มเทิร์น: ได้รับ 1 [DefenseDown] ตามทุก ๆ 100 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit (สูงสุด 10)
เริ่มเทิร์น: ได้รับ 1 [TakeHpHealIncrease] ตามทุก ๆ 200 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit (สูงสุด 5)

dataList.name: Endless Yearning
dataList.desc: Triggers a Choice Event every 'multiple of 3' turns.

dataList.name: Increased Refraction Rate
dataList.desc: If 9 turns have passed since this unit appeared on the field, starting ในเทิร์นถัดไป, ได้รับ 1 [AttackUp] every turn past the 10th turn (สูงสุด 10)

dataList.name: Designated Execution
dataList.desc: When killed by Der Fluchschütze, apply 1 [Agility], 1 [Enhancement], and 2 [AttackDmgUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป to Der Fluchschütze

dataList.name: First Strike Wins
dataList.desc: When killed by a Sinner, give 3 ทรัพยากร E.G.O in the affinity of the Skill that killed this unit

dataList.name: Not Me
dataList.desc: If this unit doesn't have Stigmatized at Combat Start, ได้รับ 300 Shield.
